title: NCommandProps
description: Neuron command palette component for searchable action menus and command interfaces. Provides keyboard-navigable item selection with type-ahead filtering.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text displayed in the search input field.

items.description: List of command items available for selection.

label.description: Display label shown for the command item.

value.description: Unique value identifier for the command item.

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
